chapters.title: Chapter 3: Pale Shadows
chapters.info: Isendre, p. 115 (83)—A woman who came into the Waste with Kadere's wagon team. Very flirtatious, she uses her physical attractiveness to lure men into telling her things they wouldn't otherwise say. She is a Darkfriend. Mat thinks he might like it if a group of women like her guarded him as tightly as the Maidens guard Rand.
